quotes.message: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Purpose is the place where your deep gladness meets the world's needs.
quotes.name: Frederick Buechner

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to be defeated by greater and greater things.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The purpose of life is not to fight against evil and misfortune; it is to unveil magnificence.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Everything in this life has a purpose, there are no mistakes, no coincidences.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Our chief usefulness to humanity rests on our combining power with high purpose. Power undirected by high purpose spells calamity, and high purpose by itself is utterly useless if the power to put it into effect is lacking.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: There is a purpose to our lives that each day tugs at our sleeve as an annoying distraction.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to glorify God in both good and hard times alike.
quotes.name: T. B. Joshua

quotes.message: This is the true joy of life, the being used up for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Having a sense of purpose is having a sense of self. A course to plot is a destination to hope for.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: You can come to understand your purpose in life by slowing down and feeling your heart's desires.
quotes.name: Marcia Wieder

quotes.message: A purpose, an intention, a design, strikes everywhere even the careless, the most stupid thinker.
quotes.name: David Hume

quotes.message: Great minds have purposes, others have wishes.
quotes.name: Washington Irving

quotes.message: The first thing to do in life is to do with purpose what one purposes to do.
quotes.name: Pablo Casals

quotes.message: If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
quotes.name: T. D. Jakes

quotes.message: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
quotes.name: Robert Bryne

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: I think the purpose of life is to be useful, to be responsible, to be honorable, to be compassionate. It is, after all, to matter: to count, to stand for something, to have made some difference that you lived at all.
quotes.name: Leo C. Rosten

quotes.message: Find a purpose in life so big it will challenge every capacity to be at your best.
quotes.name: David O. McKay

quotes.message: The purpose of life is not to be happyâ€”but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you lived at all.
quotes.name: Leo Rosten

quotes.message: Success is... knowing your purpose in life, growing to reach your maximum potential, and sowing seeds that benefit others.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: You can accept reality, or you can persist in your purpose until reality accepts you.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Man is fulfilling the purpose of existence who no longer needs to have any purpose except to live. That is to say, who is content.
quotes.name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.message: I don't think life is absurd. I think we are all here for a huge purpose. I think we shrink from the immensity of the purpose we are here for.
quotes.name: Norman Mailer

quotes.message: When you walk in purpose, you collide with destiny.
quotes.name: Ralph Buchanan

quotes.message: The life purpose of the true social entrepreneur is to change the world.
quotes.name: Bill Drayton

quotes.message: Everything happens for a reason and a purpose, and it serves you.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it.
quotes.name: Gautama Buddha

quotes.message: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Passion is so much more than a feeling. It's living in the meaningful and joy-filled zone of â€˜being' and â€˜doing' your life's purpose.
quotes.name: Kent Julian

quotes.message: Service is the rent we pay for being. It is the very purpose of life, and not something you do in your spare time.
quotes.name: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.message: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: There is a design and a purpose for each of our lives. Living unaware of that is sad, but dying unaware of it is a tragedy.
quotes.name: Lou Engle

quotes.message: The only purpose of our lives consists in waking each other up and being there for each other.
quotes.name: Johanna Paungger

quotes.message: If you have a purpose in which you can believe, there's no end to the amount of things you can accomplish.
quotes.name: Marian Anderson

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to discover your gift. The meaning of life is to give your gift away.
quotes.name: David Viscott

quotes.message: Our purpose in life is to be happy. From the very core of our being, we simply desire contentment.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The purpose of life is the expansion of happiness.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to contribute in some way to making things better.
quotes.name: Robert Kennedy

quotes.message: Life is never made unbearable by circumstances, but only by lack of meaning and purpose.
quotes.name: Viktor Frankl

quotes.message: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
quotes.name: Bram Stoker
